name: DualiTower
description:
Match opposite blocks to build a tower.

WebXR Game - Supports both AR and VR devices:

  • Android - Chrome and Samsung Internet.
  • Oculus Quest 1 and 2 - Oculus Browser.
  • Hololens 2 - Edge.
  • Windows Desktop - Chrome and Edge when a VR device is connected.

Instructions:

Drag blocks with opposite attributes from the sides of the table to the center.

Credits:

Oren De-Panther Weizman - Programming and Game Design
Sivan Birenberg - Game Design
Ilya Baksht - Models
Alon Kaplan - Music

Global Game Jam 2022 - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/dualitower-6
